committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Treasury to strike and sell gold medallions to the general public.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to strike and sell at market value 1,000,000 gold medallions in one ounce, one-half ounce, and one-quarter ounce weights. Requires such medallions to contain, in the aggregate, at least 500,000 troy ounces of fine gold. Requires each medallion to bear a likeness of George Meany.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Treasury to strike and sell gold medallions to the general public.
